items.content_html: ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.
items.title: hamzarehman033/ValidatorPK:  ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.

items.content_html: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.
items.title: JustinMLu/kineval-js: Kineval is a Javascript / ThreeJS implementation framework for web-based robot kinematics, dynamics, and autonomous control demonstrations. Kineval is compatible with ROSBridge and, as such, can be used to control actual robots through a lightweight interface.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
